presentation.conclusion: This site will allow you to learn more about my studies, my professional experiences and my projects! Enjoy 👋!
presentation.my-goal: Soon to graduate 📚, I am looking for an engineer internship for a period of 6 months. I take real pleasure in developing web applications, which is why I would like to make it my job 🚀.
presentation.my-life: Besides that, I spend my time climbing 🧗 running 🏃‍ and doing tinkering 🔨.

enib.details: Currently studying in the fifth year of a five-year course in General Engineering with Computer science Diploma expected in 2023.
enib.title: Brest National School of Engineering
